summary: Belvedere discovers that he is ineligible for an honorary award because he never attended college. So he enrolls as a freshman in a major university, becoming the target for hazing from obnoxious upper class-man Alan Young.
cast: Clifton Webb|Shirley Temple|Tom Drake|Alan Young|Jessie Royce Landis|Kathleen Hughes|Taylor Holmes|Alvin Greenman|Paul Harvey|Barry Kelley|Robert Patten|Norma Amigo|Edward Biby|Carol Brannon|John F. Bray|Judy Brubaker|Colin Campbell|Peggie Castle|Jeff Chandler|Pattie Chapman|Clancy Cooper|Evelyn Eaton|Sally Forrest|Kathleen Freeman|Geneva Gray|Lee MacGregor|Frank Mills|Joyce Otis|Elaine Ryan|Reginald Sheffield|Arthur Space|Lotte Stein|Gil Stratton|Lonnie Thomas|Ruth Tobey|Helen Westcott|Rhoda Williams|Isabel Withers
title: Mr. Belvedere estudiante
